Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to debris on the tracks near Dodge.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to debris on the tracks near Dodge.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as the nearby #97 Skokie bus route, or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
